body_html:
I've also added zero() as well as zero_() to Variable. However, is this something we want as zero() doesn't exist on tensors.

That being said, Variable also has things like masked_fill and masked_fill_ whereas only masked_fill_ exists on tensors.
body_text:
I've also added zero() as well as zero_() to Variable. However, is this something we want as zero() doesn't exist on tensors.
That being said, Variable also has things like masked_fill and masked_fill_ whereas only masked_fill_ exists on tensors.
body:
I've also added `zero()` as well as `zero_()` to `Variable`. However, is this something we want as `zero()` doesn't exist on tensors.

That being said, `Variable` also has things like `masked_fill` and `masked_fill_` whereas only `masked_fill_` exists on tensors.
